Major_Arcs.title: Introduction of The Human Meteor
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the comic book title and the main character, The Human Meteor, along with the initial underwater setting and hints at a larger threat.

sub_scenes.title: Page 1 Introduction
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of the comic title, main character, and initial underwater setting.

Major_Arcs.title: Duke's Taxi and the G-Man Chase
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Duke's taxi ride, his encounter with suspicious passengers, and his transformation and chase after a G-Man's car, setting up the action.

sub_scenes.title: Duke's Taxi Ride
sub_scenes.description: Duke picks up wealthy passengers and drives them to the waterfront.

narrative_arcs.title: Duke's Taxi Ride to the Waterfront

sub_scenes.title: The Chase Begins
sub_scenes.description: Duke transforms into Human Meteor to chase a suspicious car.

Major_Arcs.title: Confrontation and Stowaway Plan
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts Human Meteor's confrontation with suspects, his recovery, and Duke's plan to infiltrate the yacht with Toby.

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation and Aftermath
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor confronts suspects, followed by appreciation from police and recovery in hospital.

sub_scenes.title: Stowaway Infiltration
sub_scenes.description: Duke plans Toby's stowaway mission on the yacht.

Major_Arcs.title: Yacht Incident and Realization
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on events on the yacht, including the 'playboys' punishment and Duke's growing suspicion of a setup.

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Deck and Cabin Trap
sub_scenes.description: Playboys are punished on deck, one is trapped in cabin.

narrative_arcs.title: Yacht Deck Work and Cabin Trap

sub_scenes.title: Duke Suspects a Setup
sub_scenes.description: Duke realizes he might be lured into a trap by playboys.

sub_scenes.title: Toby's True Role Revealed
sub_scenes.description: Toby's real allegiance and submarine plot are revealed.

narrative_arcs.title: Submarine Plot and Toby's True Role

Major_Arcs.title: Underwater Investigation and Confrontation
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details Human Meteor's underwater reconnaissance, the discovery of the sunken submarine, and the escalating conflict with divers.

sub_scenes.title: Underwater Reconnaissance and Divers Arrival
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor goes underwater, divers arrive.

sub_scenes.title: Sunken Submarine Discovery
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor discovers a sunken Japanese submarine.

sub_scenes.title: Underwater Confrontation with Divers
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor encounters hostile divers.

narrative_arcs.title: Divers' Initial Encounter with Human Meteor
Human Meteor's Intervention and Divers' Hostility
Human Meteor's Threat and Divers' Retaliation

sub_scenes.title: Submarine's Reaction
sub_scenes.description: Submarine crew reacts to the underwater fight.

Major_Arcs.title: Underwater Attack and Shipboard Chaos
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc showcases Human Meteor's attack on the submarine and the resulting chaos on the ship above.

sub_scenes.title: Namor's Attack Preparation
sub_scenes.description: Namor (Human Meteor) prepares to attack the submarine.

sub_scenes.title: Shipboard Aftermath and Alarm
sub_scenes.description: Ship crew deals with Peter's condition and a geyser erupts.

narrative_arcs.title: Discovery of Peter's Condition on Ship
Namor's Determined Final Attack and Ship Crew's Fear

Major_Arcs.title: Yacht Investigation and Resolution
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts back to the yacht, Duke investigates Peter, and the truth is revealed, leading to a reflective conclusion.

sub_scenes.title: Boat Chase and Yacht Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: Duke chases to yacht, finds Peter alive.

narrative_arcs.title: Search for the Depth Map in Peter's Cabin
Exposing Peter's Treachery to the Officer

sub_scenes.title: Aftermath and Reflection
sub_scenes.description: Fast boat travel, hospital visit, and evening reflection.

narrative_arcs.title: Evening Reflection after a Chaotic Day
Toby's Home and Invitation to Visit Holden

Major_Arcs.title: Liberty Lads and Ambulance Mystery Begins
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces a new storyline with the Liberty Lads in action and transitions to a suburban mystery with an ambulance arrival.

sub_scenes.title: Liberty Lads Action
sub_scenes.description: Liberty Lads fight against Nazis.

narrative_arcs.title: Liberty Lads in Action Against Nazis

sub_scenes.title: Ambulance Arrival
sub_scenes.description: Ambulance arrives in a suburban street, observed by boys.

Major_Arcs.title: Bus Garage Mystery and Abduction
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Skip and Chuck's investigation into the ambulance mystery, leading them to the bus garage and their abduction by Mr. Horst.

sub_scenes.title: The Dropped Wallet and Bus Garage Lead
sub_scenes.description: Boys find a wallet with a bus garage address.

narrative_arcs.title: The Dropped Wallet and the Bus Garage Address
Marine Salutes a Civilian - Major Bronson

sub_scenes.title: Bus Garage Confrontation and Abduction
sub_scenes.description: Boys are confronted by police and abducted by Mr. Horst.

Major_Arcs.title: Interrogation, Betrayal and Escape
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc covers the interrogation of Skip and Chuck, the ensuing fight, and their escape amidst betrayal and chaos.

sub_scenes.title: Interrogation and Rising Tension
sub_scenes.description: Mr. Horst interrogates Skip and Chuck, sinister plan overheard.

sub_scenes.title: Fight and Escape
sub_scenes.description: Fight breaks out, accusations fly, and escape order given.

Major_Arcs.title: Seeking Help and Uncovering Sabotage
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details Skip's quest for help, the discovery of sabotage plans, and the military response.

sub_scenes.title: Seeking Help and Marine Alert
sub_scenes.description: Skip seeks help for Major Bronson, alerts Marines.

sub_scenes.title: Discovery of Sabotage Plans
sub_scenes.description: Skip uncovers sabotage plans in a secret office.

narrative_arcs.title: Discovery of Sabotage Plans in Secret Office

sub_scenes.title: Office Stand-off and Counter Attack
sub_scenes.description: Skip defends himself in office, Major Bronson counter-attacks.

Major_Arcs.title: Marine Victory and Resolution
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc concludes the bus garage story with the Marines' arrival, the defeat of the Nazi spies, and a celebratory resolution.

sub_scenes.title: Marine Arrival and Rescue Effort
sub_scenes.description: Marines arrive, attend to injured Bronson and engage in combat.

sub_scenes.title: Victory and Aftermath
sub_scenes.description: Victory over Nazi spies, Bronson recovers, and community solidarity.

narrative_arcs.title: Resolution and Victory Over Nazi Spies

Major_Arcs.title: Introduction to The Champ and South American Intrigue
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces a new story with The Champ and Henry in South America, caught in Nazi intrigue and facing initial conflicts.

sub_scenes.title: Setting the South American Scene
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of The Champ and Henry in South America, facing Nazi threat.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of The Champ and Henry and the Nazi Threat
Setting the Scene in South America and the Soldiers' Search
Confrontation and Fight in the Desert

Major_Arcs.title: Interrogation and Escape in South America
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows the interrogation of civilians by soldiers, Champ and Henry's escape, and the revelation of Rosita's kidnapping.

sub_scenes.title: Soldier Interrogations
sub_scenes.description: Soldiers apprehend and interrogate civilians.

sub_scenes.title: Escape and Kidnapping Revelation
sub_scenes.description: Champ and Henry escape, learn about Rosita's kidnapping.

narrative_arcs.title: Escape and the Decision to Seek the American Consul
Explanation of Suspicion: Rosita's Kidnapping and El Tigre

Major_Arcs.title: El Tigre's Kidnapping and Confrontation
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on El Tigre's actions, the forced car ride, and the arrival at the house with mistaken identity.

sub_scenes.title: Forced Car Ride
sub_scenes.description: Bald man forces men into car, suspicious ride.

narrative_arcs.title: Forced Entry into Car and Commanded Drive
Suspicious Car Ride and Destination Order

Major_Arcs.title: Rescue Plan and Hideout Infiltration
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details the planning to rescue Rosita and the infiltration of El Tigre's hideout, leading to confrontation.

sub_scenes.title: Rescue Planning
sub_scenes.description: Plans are made to confront El Tigre and rescue Rosita.

narrative_arcs.title: Preparation for Action on Tamale Street

sub_scenes.title: Hideout Infiltration and El Tigre Reveal
sub_scenes.description: Hideout infiltration using stage dollars, confrontation, and El Tigre reveal.

narrative_arcs.title: Infiltration of El Tigre's Hideout with Stage Dollars

Major_Arcs.title: Interrogation and Rescue Operation
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the interrogation of El Tigre, the plan to rescue Rosita, and the initiation of the rescue mission.

sub_scenes.title: Garbage Bin Interrogation
sub_scenes.description: El Tigre interrogated in a garbage bin.

narrative_arcs.title: Searching for Rosita and Threatening El Tigre

sub_scenes.title: Rescue Plan and Departure
sub_scenes.description: News of Rosita's imprisonment, urgent departure for rescue.

narrative_arcs.title: Ride to Headquarters and Rescue Resolve

Major_Arcs.title: Rosita's Rescue and Victory
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts the rescue mission, the fight, Rosita's rescue, and the final resolution of the South American storyline.

sub_scenes.title: Rescue Operation and Combat
sub_scenes.description: Horseback pursuit, forced entry, escape, and rapid advance.

narrative_arcs.title: Citadel Escape and Rear Entrance Strategy
Machine Gun Deployment and Rosita's Intervention

sub_scenes.title: Rosita's Rescue and Government Arrival
sub_scenes.description: Rosita is rescued, government troops arrive.

Major_Arcs.title: Devil Dog Dolan Jungle Combat and Betrayal
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc initiates a new story with Devil Dog Dolan in jungle combat, facing betrayal and difficult choices.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Combat and Reporting
sub_scenes.description: Devil Dog Dolan in jungle combat, followed by reporting.

narrative_arcs.title: Jungle Combat with Devil Dog Dolan

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Infiltration and Ambush
sub_scenes.description: Jungle entrance, exploration, and ambush by natives.

Major_Arcs.title: Coercion and Plan Acquisition
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details the capture and coercion of Dolan to obtain the sub detector plans, leading to a difficult choice for him.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Rescue and Suspicion
sub_scenes.description: Rescue from fire, suspicion among soldiers.

narrative_arcs.title: Note Writing and Plan Negotiation under Duress
Devil Dog's Recovery and Plan Acquisition

Major_Arcs.title: Arson, Attack, and Dolan's Fate
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts Dolan's arson, the marine attack, his capture, and Sam's apparent sacrifice.

sub_scenes.title: Arson and Marine Attack
sub_scenes.description: Dolan sets fire, marines attack.

narrative_arcs.title: Native Huts Ablaze Amidst Marine Assault

sub_scenes.title: Dolan's Escape and Capture
sub_scenes.description: Sam's courage in fire, Dolan's escape attempt and racist justification, Dolan's capture and Sam's fate.

Major_Arcs.title: Dolan's Jungle Fight and Native Alliance
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts Dolan's fight with natives, the Chief's death, and the unexpected alliance formed with the tribe.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Fight and Chief's Death
sub_scenes.description: Dolan fights natives, Chief dies.

narrative_arcs.title: Dolan's Jungle Entrance and Initial Encounter
Fight with Natives and Chief's Demise
Grauer's Dialogue with Native and Alliance

Major_Arcs.title: Captain's Dilemma and Dolan's Discipline
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc covers the Captain's difficult decision regarding Grauer's demands, the attack on Sam, and Dolan's disciplinary action.

sub_scenes.title: Captain's Decision and Attack on Sam
sub_scenes.description: Captain faces dilemma, Sam attacked.

sub_scenes.title: Discipline and Resolution
sub_scenes.description: Dolan disciplined, shore leave rescinded, service reaffirmed.

narrative_arcs.title: Shore Leave Rescinded and Dolan's Discipline

Major_Arcs.title: Introduction to Twinkle Twins and Burgess Murder
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc starts a new story with the introduction of the Twinkle Twins and the Burgess murder case.

sub_scenes.title: Twinkle Twins Introduction
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of Twinkle Twins and their mission.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction to the Twinkle Twins Story

sub_scenes.title: Newspaper Office Briefing
sub_scenes.description: Newspaper office briefing on Burgess murder and initial clues.

narrative_arcs.title: Newspaper Office Briefing on Burgess Murder

Major_Arcs.title: Hospital Investigation and Reilly's Condition
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Dan and Diane's investigation to the police station and hospital, revealing Reilly's illness and vulnerability.

sub_scenes.title: Police Station Inquiry
sub_scenes.description: Police station inquiry reveals Reilly is hospitalized.

narrative_arcs.title: Police Station Inquiry about Reilly's Skip

sub_scenes.title: Hospital Visit and Diagnosis
sub_scenes.description: Hospital visit reveals Reilly's illness and need for specific blood.

Major_Arcs.title: Blood Transfusion and Farnacci's Arrest
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the race to save Reilly's life with a blood transfusion and the subsequent arrest of Farnacci, resolving the murder mystery.

sub_scenes.title: Blood Type Revelation and Call for Help
sub_scenes.description: Blood type revelation, call for help from Elijah and Alderman.

narrative_arcs.title: Candy Store Phone Call to Elijah about Farnacci
Urgent Call for Blood and Community Response

sub_scenes.title: News Report and Community Mobilization
sub_scenes.description: News report reveals Farnacci's gang, community mobilizes for blood donation.

narrative_arcs.title: Decision to Locate Tom Reilly in Irish Section
Failed Blood Donation Match and Community Appeal

sub_scenes.title: Blood Transfusion and Recovery
sub_scenes.description: Blood matching, transfusion, and Reilly's recovery.

sub_scenes.title: Farnacci's Arrest and Birthday Celebration
sub_scenes.description: Decision to arrest Farnacci, police raid, arrest, and birthday party resolution.

narrative_arcs.title: Decision to Arrest Farnacci and Police Action
Police Raid on Poolroom and Arrest

Major_Arcs.title: Reilly's Escape and Gangster Confrontation
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details Reilly's escape from Mrs. Murphy's house, Diane's pursuit, and Reilly's street fight with gangsters.

sub_scenes.title: Reilly's Escape and Pursuit Begins
sub_scenes.description: Searching for Reilly, Mrs. Murphy's revelation, Reilly's escape and Diane's pursuit begins.

narrative_arcs.title: Searching for Tom Reilly in the Irish Section
Mrs. Murphy's Revelation about Reilly and Farnacci
Reilly's Coal Chute Escape and Diane's Pursuit

sub_scenes.title: Street Blockade and Gangster Arrest
sub_scenes.description: Irish neighborhood blockade, Reilly's fight with gangsters, and their arrest.

Major_Arcs.title: Ambulance and Hospital Scenes after Shooting
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the immediate aftermath of the shooting, ambulance arrival, hospital scenes, and concern for the victims.

sub_scenes.title: Ambulance and Transport
sub_scenes.description: Ambulance arrives at shooting scene, transports injured.

narrative_arcs.title: Ambulance Transport and Concern for Victims

sub_scenes.title: Hospital Waiting and Diagnosis
sub_scenes.description: Hospital waiting, doctor's diagnosis for Reilly and Mrs. Murphy.
